entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
